name: Harry Potter Chamber of Secrets mini-experience
name_original: Harry Potter Chamber of Secrets mini-experience
description:
Explore the abandoned bathroom with Harry and Ron as you find and open the entrance to the Chamber of Secrets! Discover who else might be hiding in the bathroom, and who will be going into the Chamber as you adventure through this mini-story experience. 

This is an experimental project, and a parody of the Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets movie bathroom scene. All franchise concepts seen in game do not belong to me. 

This game was made using the Godot game engine. 

Fog background shader effect by "Gonkee's fog shader for Godot 3". Check out more of Gonkee's content on YouTube! 

All other art, music, and sound was created by Lukeworm. (March 2023)

Thanks for checking out the game! All feedback is welcome!
